Availability test @availability › Main page loads and video player is ready
Video Player Playback Controls › Play button triggers play event and video plays
Video Player Playback Controls › Pause button triggers pause event and video pauses

failure.message: video-player.playback.spec.ts:18:9 Pause button triggers pause event and video pauses
